column2: British expats have lost their battle in the Supreme Court for the right to vote in the EU referendum #EUref
Reuters: Egyptian head of forensics denies reports that an initial examination of human remains points to an explosion on #Egyptair #MS804
RMT union says London Underground maintenance and engineering workers have voted to go on strike in a row linked to the night Tube service
Sky Sources: Jose #Mourinho is close to agreeing personal terms with Manchester United to become their new manager
International Organisation for Migration says 1,370 migrants have died in Mediterranean so far in 2016 - 25% lower than same period in 2015
AP: An Egyptian forensic official says human remains retrieved from the #Egyptair #MS804 crash site point to an explosion on board
